meanings.sent2: The old man was known as the village foreshadower.
meanings.sent3: The foreshadower always knew when trouble was coming.
meanings.sent4: Her sudden silence was a foreshadower of the impending argument.
meanings.sent5: The howling wind served as a chilling foreshadower of the approaching danger.

meanings.sent1: The dark clouds were a foreshadower of the rain to come.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious letter was a strange foreshadower of events to follow.
meanings.sent3: The black cat crossing their path was seen as a foreshadower of bad luck.
meanings.sent4: The eerie silence in the room was a foreshadower of the ghostly presence.
meanings.sent5: The distant sound of thunder acted as a foreshadower of the approaching storm.
